--- title: nbdev tutorial 01 keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "some API details." --- 
'Hello nbdev :)'

say_hi[source]

say_hi(to)

Say hi to someone

test example¶

test_eq(say_hi('nbdev'), 'Hello nbdev :)')

class HelloSayer:
    "say hello to `to` using `say_hi` func"
    
    def __init__(self, to):
        self.to = to
        
    def say(self):
        return say_hi(self.to)

show doc example¶

HelloSayer.say[source]

HelloSayer.say()

o = HelloSayer('nbdev')
print(o.say())

Hello nbdev :)
